package.name: gn36/firstpostedit
package.description: Allows differenciating editing permissions for the first post. Allows bypassing the max edit time setting for the first or all posts on a per-forum basis. If you use other extensions that change users edit permissions, please check thoroughly whether they still work correctly in combination with this extension.
